title: Watcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Watch someone at night and shoot someone during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> When you watch someone, you will know who they visit, and who visited them.

> During the day you may shoot one person you saw (last night's target, who your target visited, or who visited your target).

> If you shoot a Town member, you will be roleblocked the next night.

desc:
Post 1589
*"No don't report me to the Sheriff I promise I'm watching you through your window for your own good please you gotta believe me!"*
